# Teraslice Op Test Harness

> A testing harness to simplify testing Teraslice processors and operations.

This a package within the [Teraslice](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice) monorepo. See our [documentation](https://terascope.github.io/teraslice/docs/packages/teraslice-op-test-harness/overview) for more information or the [issues](https://github.com/terascope/teraslice/issues?q=is%3Aopen+is%3Aissue+label%3Apkg%2Fteraslice-op-test-harness) associated with this package
